answers.answer: That is so wonderful, those numbers are great. Keep us posted on how thursday goes.

Of course I will!!Quick Question::Have any of you had a pregnancy were in order for you not to feel sick(nauseated) you had to constantly eat?  That's how I feel. If I don't eat or have something in my mouth I get very very sick, and I throw up.  I don't want to gain to much weight but if it's to have a healthy baby I don't mind, but I also don't want to go through gestational diabetes or preclampsia.  I seemed to crave a lot of salty foods and sparkly drinks (soda) lol.  Please help any suggestions would be appreciated!!

I'm just starting out on my pregnancy journey, but I do wake up queasy.  I've tried eating, but nothing tastes good to me.  I usually find some type of hard candy (regular or sugar free) to suck on and with it in my mouth that helps.Also, they make what they call Preggie Pops, which are suckers to help with nausea and I saw where they've made it in a losenge too.
I hear alot about these preggo pops, I'm just wondering if they really work??!!!!

I feel exactly the same way. It was a little worse earlier on in my pregnancy (I'm 13 weeks), but I still notice it. I try to keep stuff around that is low in calories and fat. My favorites have been pretzels, fruit snacks, graham crackers... Really anything I can eat a little bit of, just to keep my blood sugar up, really, really kept me from getting sick.I haven't ever gotten sick during the day, because I am good at controlling it, only in the mornings, because I just can't eat right when I get up.And I have stayed at about the same weight. I lost a couple pounds in the first 6 or 7 weeks, and I have slowly gained them back, so I am still right around my pre-pregnancy weight. Just as long as you still keep an eye on your portions and don't over-do it, I think you'll be fine.Good luck, and congrats!!

question: Hey Ladies.......So I took another blood test a few minutes ago(doctors orders) and from 2316 it went up to 27,305!!! Everything is going great, hopefully i get to hear or see my baby's heartbeat on Thursday.
title: HCG Update
